title: Space Telescopes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/13/19
itunes:title: Space Telescopes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/13/19
description:
George Noory and Peter Eisenhardt of the Jet Propulsion Laboratory discuss the Spitzer Space Telescope, which is using infrared astronomy to explore the universe and search for extraterrestrial life and exoplanets.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
George Noory and Peter Eisenhardt of the Jet Propulsion Laboratory discuss the Spitzer Space Telescope, which is using infrared astronomy to explore the universe and search for extraterrestrial life and exoplanets.

itunes:summary: A scientist explains how new technology is helping the search for life in the galaxy.
